meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree
meanings.sent1: She appreciated his help muchly during the difficult times.
meanings.sent2: She talks muchly about her favorite books.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail muchly when it saw its owner.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed muchly after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The students thanked their teacher muchly for the extra help.

meanings.definition: In a large amount or quantity
meanings.sent1: He ate muchly at the buffet and felt very full.
meanings.sent2: The store stocked up muchly on popular items for the sale.
meanings.sent3: The cat slept muchly in the warm sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed muchly after the heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: The children laughed muchly during the funny movie.
